instruction.value: Instill into conjuctiva of LEFT eye immediately prior to procedure. May repeat at 5 to 10 minute intervals as needed.
Instill into conjuctiva of RIGHT eye immediately prior to procedure. May repeat at 5 to 10 minute intervals as needed.
Instill into conjuctiva of affected eye(s) immediately prior to procedure. May repeat at 5 to 10 minute intervals as needed.
Instill into conjuctiva of LEFT eye immediately prior to procedure. May repeat at 10 minute intervals as needed.
Instill into conjuctiva of RIGHT eye immediately prior to procedure. May repeat at 10 minute intervals as needed.
Instill into conjuctiva of affected eye(s) immediately prior to procedure. May repeat at 10 minute intervals as needed.
Instill into conjuctiva of LEFT eye.
Instill into conjuctiva of RIGHT eye.
Instill into conjuctiva of affected eye(s).
Instill into conjuctiva of affected eye(s).
